sentence: U.S. Senate candidate Herschel Walker has spent the opening months on the campaign trail speaking mostly to conservative media outlets that offered him friendly questions.

title: The Jolt: The Cobb homage to treason planned for Jan. 6

sentence: In this years Senate race, the poll showed Republican Herschel Walker favored at 47% to Warnock at 44%, within the margin of error.

title: Sharp growth in Georgia voters alters landscape for 2022 elections

sentence: Trump also wants to boost former Georgia football star Herschel Walker, the Republican frontrunner in the race for U.S. Senate who is already looking ahead to a matchup against Democratic incumbent Raphael Warnock.

title: Perdue welcomes Trump to Georgia by embracing stolen election lie

sentence: Abrams is unopposed in her effort to unseat Kemp in November and Warnock is expected to sail through his primary before facing a challenge from Trump-backed former football star Herschel Walker.

title: Georgia set to test Trump's US voter fraud 'Big Lie'

sentence: The most high-profile candidate Trump endorsed is former college and pro-football legend Herschel Walker, who easily captured the GOP nomination on his way to battling Democratic Sen. sentence: Trump was not without victories most significantly Herschel Walker in the U.S. Senate primary.
